entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 10.6°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 95 %

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or freezing rain. Low minus 1 except plus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain after midnight. Rain along parts of the coast. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 1 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
